duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement state-of-the-art AI / ML / DL methods for protein engineering and computational sciences.
Build robust workflows and develop novel algorithms for protein sequence and structure analysis.
Utilize computational methods and databases related to proteins for data analysis and reasoning.
Contribute to the advancement of bioinformatics, NGS data analysis, and optimization algorithms.
Participate in cloud-computing, systems administration, and data security tasks for computational projects.
Drive impact through in-depth analytical ability, scientific mindset, and perseverance to achieve project goals.

education_certification.credential: Masters / Ph.D. in Computational Sciences or related field.
